definition: difference/discrepancy/to differ/error/to err/to make a mistake
to differ from/to fall short of/lacking/wrong/inferior/Taiwan pr. [cha1]

sentences.english: In the selling expenses control, the travel expense how to limit and so on.
sentences.chinese: 销售费用控制中，差旅费如何界定等。

sentences.english: The salesman padded the bill for his traveling expenses by exaggerating his food expenses.
sentences.chinese: 那位推销员夸大伙食费用以此浮报差旅费。

sentences.english: Participants in the high-power group considered the misreporting of travel expenses to be a significantly worse offense.
sentences.chinese: 高权力组成员认为虚报差旅费是一种相当严重的过错。

sentences.english: The accounting department will reimburse you for all your meals and travel expenses.
sentences.chinese: 财务部门会报销所有的餐费和差旅费。

sentences.english: This Delay Reasons Report should be attached to the Expenses Report of business trip.
sentences.chinese: 本表请并同出差旅费报告书核销。

definition: to be reimbursed for actual expenses
to get an advance on one's pay
(accounting) to strike a balance/to reverse an entry/to write off
render an account/submit an expense account/apply for reimbursement
